**Minkai Wang** is a Ph.D. student in the Department of Educational Technology at **Zhejiang University**, supervised by Prof. Xuesong Zhai. He is also a veteran who served in the Strategic Support Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (PLA).

His research interests lie at the intersection of **Game-based Learning (GBL)**, **Artificial Intelligence in Education (AIED)**, and the **Metaverse**. He is dedicated to exploring how emerging technologies can reshape learning experiences and cognitive development.

His academic work has been published in international authoritative journals such as *Journal of Computer Assisted Learning*, *Journal of Educational Computing Research*, and *Entertainment Computing*.
